title.narrative: Trachomatous Trichiasis Backlog Mali

description.narrative: ​The goal of this project is to contribute to the elimination of blinding trachoma in Mali by 2015. 1. Reduce the national TT backlog by 40%, targeting 20 districts in the regions of Koulikoro, Kayes, Sikasso, Mopti and Segou. 2. Improve quality of TT surgical outcomes. 3. Strengthen human resources for community case detection and referral. 4. Improve data collection and create a body of evidence determining the location of remaining TT cases.

participating-org.narrative: Ireland - Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade
